attributes.action: This petition is a direct show of support for the leadership of Jeremy Corbyn.
attributes.additional_details: We members of the Labour party wholly support Jeremy Corbyn and will withdraw our mandate to the Labour Party if he is deselected as it's Leader. In instigating this Vote of no confidence Hillary Benn is once again trying to shift the Labour party back to its days under Tony Blair and the Neo-liberal right. We support the ideals of the Party and it's  leader as is stands at present and do not wish Hilary Benn to betray his own party and father's ideals and bring back New Labour.
attributes.background: We Labour members and voters for the Labour party, hereby declare are sincere support for Jeremy Corbyn Leader of the opposition. We deplore the Actions of Hilary Benn MP, in invoking a vote of no confidence against the labour leader and declare our direct support for him over any other candidate.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
